Helper for Theorem 4.2.2: divide the factorial identity to recover coefficients.

lemma helperForTheorem_4_2_2_coeff_rewrite_from_factorial_identity {E : Set } (f : E ) (a : E) (c : ) (hfac : n : , IteratedDerivativeSub E f n a = (Nat.factorial n : ) * c n) : n : , IteratedDerivativeSub E f n a / (Nat.factorial n : ) = c n := by intro n have hne : (Nat.factorial n : ) 0 := by exact_mod_cast Nat.factorial_ne_zero n calc IteratedDerivativeSub E f n a / (Nat.factorial n : ) = ((Nat.factorial n : ) * c n) / (Nat.factorial n : ) := by rw [hfac n] _ = c n := by exact mul_div_cancel_left (c n) hne
